# Checkout v6 Test

This file is used to test the compatibility of actions/checkout@v6 with the repository's CI/CD workflows.

**Test Date:** 2025-12-11
**PR:** #42 - Bump actions/checkout from 5 to 6

## Test Objectives

- ✅ Verify checkout@v6 works with GitHub-hosted runners
- ✅ Confirm compatibility with Docker container actions (Trivy, Semgrep)
- ✅ Ensure no credential-related failures
- ✅ Validate all workflow triggers execute successfully

## Test Status

Testing in progress...

This file can be safely deleted after testing is complete.
